text: The Teatro dell'Opera di Roma (Rome Opera House) is an opera house in Rome, Italy. It first opened in November 1880 as the 2,212 seat Costanzi Theatre. It has gone through many changes such as making the building more modern and changing its name. The current building has 1,600 seats. ==Other websites== * *Photographs of the opera house, andreas-praefcke.de * Teatro dell'Opera di Roma, Google Cultural Institute Category:Theatres Category:Buildings and structures in Rome Category:Buildings and structures completed in the 19th century
title: Teatro dell'Opera di Roma
